search.query:
| inputlookup df_analytic_rating.csv
| append [ stats count | eval AnalyticID = "$input_asset$" | eval DetectionRating= "$input_detection$" | eval ResponseRating= "$input_response$" | eval SophisticationRating= "$input_sophistication$" | eval Comment= "$input_comment$" | eval temp_dt = now() | eval DateAdded = strftime(now(), "%Y-%m-%d") | fields - _raw _time count | table * | join type=outer [ |rest /services/authentication/current-context/context| fields username| where username!="splunk-system-user" | rename username AS Contact]]
| eval DetectionScore=case(DetectionRating=="No Visual", 0,DetectionRating=="Local Visual", 30, DetectionRating=="Central Visual", 60, DetectionRating=="Active Visual", 100) | eval ResponseScore=case(ResponseRating=="No Response", 0,ResponseRating=="Identification", 30, ResponseRating=="Response", 60, ResponseRating=="Identification and Response", 100) | eval SophisticationScore=case(SophisticationRating=="Novice", 0,SophisticationRating=="Practitioner", 30, SophisticationRating=="Expert", 60, SophisticationRating=="Innovator", 100)
| sort -temp_dt | dedup AnalyticID | fields - temp_dt TacticID | sort - DateAdded
|outputlookup df_analytic_rating.csv
| where AnalyticID="$input_asset$"
